name: You Can(Not) Survive
description: Zombies, zombies, zombies... are on the attack - can you survive the onslaught? You Can(Not) Survive is an RPG zombie shooter. Find and upgrade weapons, fight against bosses, complete quests.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2 cores 2.25 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon R800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher x64 Processor: 4 cores 2.5Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 600 series or AMD Radeon 74XX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
